summary: Lane B complete: --stream-output mode added to run_phi.py; has_stream_block detection implemented; P1Host.stream() emits one JSON line per cycle to /tmp/phiflow_stream_latest.jsonl; stream_broken field added to ConsciousnessSnapshot; 3-cycle natural cap implemented (WASM lacks native break-stream host signal); fail-first tests pass.

verification.full_regression: pytest tests/test_run_phi_pipeline.py -v (CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target-antigravity to bypass active Lane A lock)
verification.wasm_constraint: WASM codegen strips loop-back edges â€” break stream does not propagate a host-visible signal; 3-cycle cap in P1Host.stream() is documented bounded termination strategy, not a workaround
